title: "‘Travel in Colours’: Agoda unveils a vivid journey around the world, through AI-powered storytelling"
excerpt: "From the Beber Tribes of the Sahara to the ancient Pyramids of Giza, yellow tells a story of heritage. Marvel at the Grand Canyon’s majesty, admire the Rajasthani women in yellow saris, or choose to wander through sunflower fields in Tuscany. Explore the Golden Souks of Dubai and ascend China’s Yellow Mountain for a journey bathed in gold."
